title: (Super)latus proj
description: This works features two identical protagonists who are mutually critiquing each other with superlative adjectives, positives and negatives. Both counterparts become increasingly pixelated, censoring one another and disappearing over time. This work puts at stake the notion of critical subjectivity and the self-cancelling quality of such criticism. The vile for some may well be valuable to others. Even though it's often sterile, such criticism may sometimes create fertile antagonistic appreciations and clashes that result into third definitions.
